title: Beau Boeckmann: Supply Chains, Mach-E Updates, Porsche contest
description:
Recorded from Porsche Santa Clarita with our favorite car dealership king, Beau Boeckmann! @beauboeckmann

We talk about why the Mach-E update takes so long (science!); the BMW door lock solution; Porsche Santa Clarita's entry for the Porsche Classic Restoration Challenge (and why Beau doesn't care about winning), why having a Porsche 962 in your basement is scary; Matt's weird auction interest, the dealership inventory situation, supply chain ups and downs, and why people shouldn't buy grey cars. 

Learn more about the restoration challenge here: https://www.porsche.com/usa/accessoriesandservices/classic/classic-world-events/classic-restoration-challenge/ 

Recorded July 23, 2022
